mapper.insert: insert into board (board_num, board_title, board_content, board_readcount, board_ref, board_lev, board_seq, board_date, board_evaluation, board_coursename, board_picture, board_del, num, course_num) values (board_num_seq.nextval, #{board_title}, #{board_content}, 0, board_num_seq.nextval, 0, 0, sysdate, #{board_evaluation}, #{board_coursename}, #{board_picture ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 0, #{num}, #{course_num})
mapper.select: select * from (select rownum rnum, boardAll.* from (select b.*, m.id, m.icon from board b join member m on m.num= b.num order by b.board_ref desc, b.board_seq asc) boardAll) where rnum >= ((#{page}-1) * 10 + 1) and rnum <= (#{page} * 10)
mapper.update: update board set board_readcount = board_readcount + 1 where board_num = #{board_num}

update board set board_title = #{board_title}, board_coursename = #{board_coursename}, course_num = #{course_num}, board_content = #{board_content}, board_evaluation = #{board_evaluation}, board_picture = #{board_picture} where board_num = #{board_num}
